amendment.description: To increase the amount appropriated for United States Customs and Border Protection salaries and expenses by $44,000,000 to place an additional 236 border patrol agents along the Northern Border and to fully offset that amount with corresponding reductions in the appropriations for administrative travel and printing.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4663 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
